help-file.title: SKILL_BERSERKER
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all the skills available to the berserker class.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 1h flaying, 2h bludgeon, 2h flaying, bandage, berserk, carve, climb, dodge, first aid, fishing, kick, mine, parry, retreat, rush, unarmed damage, vicious strike 6th level: blindfighting, rage, riposte 11th level: double attack, dual wield, hitall 26th level: war cry 31st level maul 36th level: rampage 41st level: enrage 46th level: triple attack
Berserker Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Mauler, Ragelord
